/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the distance. A car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and urban life.
